title: Windows 8.1 With Update AIO 6in1 v.07.2014 (by Djakonda) (x86-x6
description:
<a href="http://cdn3.pcadvisor.co.uk/cmsdata/features/3455021/Windows_8.1.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://cdn3.pcadvisor.co.uk/cmsdata/features/3455021/Windows_8.1.png</a>

Info
Release Date: 2014
Version: 07.2014
Developer: MicroSoft
By assembling: Djakonda
Bit: x86/x64
Language: English, Russian LP, German LP
Tablet: Not required

Description:
Windows 8.1 with Update includes improvements that make Windows more familiar and convenient for devices with a mouse and touch input, as well as ensure availability of Windows on a wider range of devices, giving you more choices.

This assembly includes 6 editions of Windows 8.1 With Update x86 and x64:
Windows 8.1 (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Pro (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Enterprise (32-bit)

Windows 8.1 (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Pro (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Enterprise (64-bit)

Installed the updates to June 2014
activation of
during installation asks you if you want to activate Windows 8.1

Installing the Russian and the German language:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Press Win + R
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In the window that appears prescribes "lpksetup" and click "OK"
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The window "Add / Remove Language". In it, click the "Set Language"
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Specify the path to the file:
for x86
lp_ru-ru_x86.cab or lp_de-de_x86.cab (in the folder)
for x64
lp_ru-ru_x64.cab or lp_de-de_x64.cab (in the folder)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Click "Next"
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wait for the end of installation.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Go to Control Panel  All Control Panel Items  Language  Options and then select the language system
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Go to Control Panel-> Clock, Language and Region-> Regional Options-> Advanced-> Copy Options and put a tick in the parameters below.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Restart the computer. Everything. Windows 8.1 is fully translated!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ P.S. Optionally, you can install any language pack you need, instructions here

Language: English, Russian LP, German LP
Tablet: Not required

Description:
Windows 8.1 with Update includes improvements that make Windows more familiar and convenient for devices with a mouse and touch input, as well as ensure availability of Windows on a wider range of devices, giving you more choices.

This assembly includes 6 editions of Windows 8.1 With Update x86 and x64:
Windows 8.1 (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Pro (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Enterprise (32-bit)

Windows 8.1 (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Pro (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Enterprise (64-bit)

Installed the updates to June 2014
activation of
during installation asks you if you want to activate Windows 8.1

Installing the Russian and the German language:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Press Win + R
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In the window that appears prescribes "lpksetup" and click "OK"
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The window "Add / Remove Language". In it, click the "Set Language"
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Specify the path to the file:
for x86
lp_ru-ru_x86.cab or lp_de-de_x86.cab (in the folder)
for x64
lp_ru-ru_x64.cab or lp_de-de_x64.cab (in the folder)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Click "Next"
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wait for the end of installation.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Go to Control Panel  All Control Panel Items  Language  Options and then select the language system
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Go to Control Panel-> Clock, Language and Region-> Regional Options-> Advanced-> Copy Options and put a tick in the parameters below.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Restart the computer. Everything. Windows 8.1 is fully translated!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ P.S. Optionally, you can install any language pack you need, instructions here
